ItemDescription.Description: This starter item restores its user's Health and Mana when in assist range of a slain minion.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Getting an assist when an enemy dies provides a stack that gives 1% Movement Speed and 2% Attack Speed for 8s to nearby allies up to 10 stacks. When you've gained 3 or more stacks from assists, once per ability, each time you damage an enemy god you restore 18 Health and Mana to nearby allies within 55 units and gain 10 gold. Can be upgraded at level 15.

ShortDesc: Assists empower you and your allies.

ItemDescription.Description: Provides vision and warmth to allies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Place a radiant glow at a target location for 90s. Allies who move through this field gain 10% increased Power if above half health or 10% Movement Speed if below Half Health for 12s. This fragment acts as a Sentry Ward. If destroyed the cooldown of the relic is reduced by 20s. On use, a light sprite appears that patrols back and forth on a 80 unit line, revealing enemies along the way. Cooldown - 90s.

ShortDesc: Summon a mobile ward and buff allies

ItemDescription.Description: Provides vision and warmth to allies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Place a radiant glow at a target location for 90s. Allies who move through this field gain 10% increased Power and 15% Movement Speed for 6s. This fragment acts as a Sentry Ward. If destroyed the cooldown of the relic is reduced by 20s. Cooldown - 100s.

ShortDesc: Provides vision and warmth to allies

ItemDescription.Description: Reduces enemy gods Attack Speed and Movement Speed.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item Slows the Movement Speed of all enemy gods within 35 units by 30% for 5s. Their Attack Speed is reduced by 25% for the duration. Additionally, their Damage Dealt is reduced by 10%. If an enemy deals 10% of an Allied God's Maximum Health within the duration, the debuff's effects are increased by 5% each, stacking up to 3 times. Cooldown - 110s.

ShortDesc: Punish enemy gods for damaging allied gods

ItemDescription.Description: Mana and Health restoration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item causes you to Enter a meditative state where nearby allied gods within 35 units restore 20 + 3% of their missing health and 30 + 4% of missing mana each pulse. You also gain a protective barrier of wind that explodes if an enemy comes within 15 units, knocking them back. Pulses occur once every second for 4s. Cooldown - 130s.

ShortDesc: Gain a shield of wind that knocks enemies back

ItemDescription.Description: Using this item grants the owner invulnerability for a short duration.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item makes you invulnerable to damage and healing for 1.5s, and prevents you from taking any actions. You may still move. Cooldown - 170s.

ShortDesc: Invulnerability for a duration

ItemDescription.Description: Ally damage buff.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item grants all allied gods within 70 units 10% Increased Damage dealt to all targets, including objectives, and 25% Attack Speed increase for 6 seconds. Cooldown - 130s.

ShortDesc: Damage buff for allied gods

ItemDescription.Description: Short range teleport.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item will allow you to teleport up to 45 units away instantly. This item can not be used if you have taken or dealt damage in the last 3s. Cooldown - 140s.

ShortDesc: Short range teleport

ItemDescription.Description: Provides vision and warmth to allies.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Place a radiant glow at a target location for 90s. Allies who move through this glow gain 10% increased Power if above half health or 10% Movement Speed if below Half Health for 6s. This fragment acts as a ward. If destroyed the cooldown of the relic is reduced by 20s. Cooldown - 120s.

ShortDesc: Provides vision and warmth to allies

ItemDescription.Description: Reduces enemy Healing.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item reduces the Healing received by all enemy gods within 55 units by 40%, decreases their shield effectiveness by 50% for 10s and removes 75% of any currently applied shield. Enemies that are healed by god abilities while affected by this curse take 10% more damage from all sources for the duration of the curse. Cooldown - 120s.

ShortDesc: Reduce enemy healing

ItemDescription.Description: Increases ally Movement Speed
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item increases the Movement Speed of allied gods within 55 units by 20% for 5s and makes them immune to Slows. Cooldown - 130s

ShortDesc: Increases Movement Speed of allied gods

ItemDescription.Description: Reduces enemy gods Attack Speed and Movement Speed.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item Slows the Movement Speed of all enemy gods within 35 units by 30% for 5s. Their Attack Speed is reduced by 25% for the duration. Additionally, their Damage Dealt is reduced by 10%. Cooldown - 130s.

ShortDesc: Reduce enemy Attack Speed and Movement Speed

ItemDescription.Description: Removes Crowd Control Effects.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item removes Crowd Control Effects and makes you immune to new ones for 2s. Cooldown - 170s.

ShortDesc: Removes crowd control effects

ItemDescription.Description: Upon activation you reflect 25% of all damage you take for the next 5s back to its owner.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item reflects 30% of all damage you take, before mitigations, for the next 5 seconds, back to its owner as Magical Damage. If you are dealt 120 * your level damage while this effect is active, the effect will end early. While this is active enemies can only lifesteal from you for 75% of their total lifesteal. Cooldown - 140s.

ShortDesc: Reflect damage taken

ItemDescription.Description: Teleport to an allied structure or ward. Not interrupted by damage.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item allows you to teleport to any allied structure while Rooted in place. This effect is not interrupted by damage but is interrupted by hard Crowd Control. Cooldown - 220s.

ShortDesc: Teleport to an allied structure. Not interrupted by damage.

ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: Using this item makes you invulnerable to damage and healing for 1.5s, and prevents you from taking any actions. You may still move. Cooldown - 140s.
